oneko ===== The ever popular kitty-that-follows-your-mouse-pointer toy. Neko is Japanese for cat. According to Wikipedia it was originally written for the NEC PC-9801. There are many many versions. Generally it is considered Public Domain software, so I am placing my fork under the Unlicense. This fork is based on Werner Randelshofer's Java port. The image files are ancient public domain. The Java code for v.1.0 is c 2010 Werner Randelhofer. The Java code for v.2.0 c 2019 Gerald Reno links ===== Download Project wiki
